006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IConfiguration;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnBoolean;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnData;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.AbstractNodeItemVisitor;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;

031import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
033import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
034
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Collection;
037import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
038import java.util.LinkedList;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
042import java.util.regex.Pattern;
043
044import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
045
046import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
047import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
048
049/**
050 * Used to perform constraint validation over one or more node items.
051 * <p>
052 * This class is not thread safe.
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({
055    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects",
056    "PMD.GodClass" // provides validators for all types
057})
058public class DefaultConstraintValidator
059    implements IConstraintValidator, IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> { // NOPMD - intentional
060  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultConstraintValidator.class);
061
062  @NonNull
063  private final Map<INodeItem, ValueStatus> valueMap = new LinkedHashMap<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
064  @NonNull
065  private final Map<String, IIndex> indexNameToIndexMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
066  @NonNull
067  private final Map<String, List<KeyRef>> indexNameToKeyRefMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
068  @NonNull
069  private final IConstraintValidationHandler handler;
070  @NonNull
071  private final IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> configuration;
072
073  /**
074   * Construct a new constraint validator instance.
075   *
076   * @param handler
077   *          the validation handler to use for handling constraint violations
078   */
079  public DefaultConstraintValidator(
080      @NonNull IConstraintValidationHandler handler) {
081    this.handler = handler;
082    this.configuration = new DefaultConfiguration<>();
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Get the current configuration of the serializer/deserializer.
087   *
088   * @return the configuration
089   */
090  @NonNull
091  protected IMutableConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> getConfiguration() {
092    return configuration;
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public DefaultConstraintValidator enableFeature(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
097    return set(feature, true);
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  public DefaultConstraintValidator disableFeature(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
102    return set(feature, false);
103  }
104
105  @Override
106  public DefaultConstraintValidator applyConfiguration(
107      @NonNull IConfiguration<ValidationFeature<?>> other) {
108    getConfiguration().applyConfiguration(other);
109    return this;
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public DefaultConstraintValidator set(ValidationFeature<?> feature, Object value) {
114    getConfiguration().set(feature, value);
115    return this;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public boolean isFeatureEnabled(ValidationFeature<?> feature) {
120    return getConfiguration().isFeatureEnabled(feature);
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  public Map<ValidationFeature<?>, Object> getFeatureValues() {
125    return getConfiguration().getFeatureValues();
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Get the validation handler to use for handling constraint violations.
130   *
131   * @return the handler
132   */
133  @NonNull
134  protected IConstraintValidationHandler getConstraintValidationHandler() {
135    return handler;
136  }
137
138  @Override
139  public void validate(
140      @NonNull INodeItem item,
141      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
142    item.accept(new Visitor(), dynamicContext);
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Validate the provided flag item against any associated constraints.
147   *
148   * @param item
149   *          the flag item to validate
150   * @param dynamicContext
151   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
152   *          evaluation
153   * @throws MetapathException
154   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
155   *           constraint
156   */
157  protected void validateFlag(
158      @NonNull IFlagNodeItem item,
159      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
160    IFlagDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
161
162    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
163    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
164    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
165    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Validate the provided field item against any associated constraints.
170   *
171   * @param item
172   *          the field item to validate
173   * @param dynamicContext
174   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
175   *          evaluation
176   * @throws MetapathException
177   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
178   *           constraint
179   */
180  protected void validateField(
181      @NonNull IFieldNodeItem item,
182      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
183    IFieldDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
184
185    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
186    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
187    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
188    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
189  }
190
191  /**
192   * Validate the provided assembly item against any associated constraints.
193   *
194   * @param item
195   *          the assembly item to validate
196   * @param dynamicContext
197   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
198   *          evaluation
199   * @throws MetapathException
200   *           if an error occurred while evaluating a Metapath used in a
201   *           constraint
202   */
203  protected void validateAssembly(
204      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
205      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
206    IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
207
208    validateExpect(definition.getExpectConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
209    validateAllowedValues(definition.getAllowedValuesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
210    validateIndexHasKey(definition.getIndexHasKeyConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
211    validateMatches(definition.getMatchesConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
212    validateHasCardinality(definition.getHasCardinalityConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
213    validateIndex(definition.getIndexConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
214    validateUnique(definition.getUniqueConstraints(), item, dynamicContext);
215  }
216
217  /**
218   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
219   * the {@code item}.
220   *
221   * @param constraints
222   *          the constraints to execute
223   * @param item
224   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
225   * @param dynamicContext
226   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
227   *          evaluation
228   */
229  private void validateHasCardinality( // NOPMD false positive
230      @NonNull List<? extends ICardinalityConstraint> constraints,
231      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
232      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
233    for (ICardinalityConstraint constraint : constraints) {
234      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
235      try {
236        validateHasCardinality(constraint, item, targets);
237      } catch (MetapathException ex) {
238        rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
239      }
240    }
241  }
242
243  /**
244   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
245   * {@code targets}.
246   *
247   * @param constraint
248   *          the constraint to execute
249   * @param node
250   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
251   *          targets
252   * @param targets
253   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
254   *          Metapath clauses
255   */
256  private void validateHasCardinality(
257      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
258      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
259      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
260    int itemCount = targets.size();
261
262    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
263
264    boolean violation = false;
265    Integer minOccurs = constraint.getMinOccurs();
266    if (minOccurs != null && itemCount < minOccurs) {
267      handler.handleCardinalityMinimumViolation(constraint, node, targets);
268      violation = true;
269    }
270
271    Integer maxOccurs = constraint.getMaxOccurs();
272    if (maxOccurs != null && itemCount > maxOccurs) {
273      handler.handleCardinalityMaximumViolation(constraint, node, targets);
274      violation = true;
275    }
276
277    if (!violation) {
278      handlePass(constraint, node, node);
279    }
280  }
281
282  /**
283   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
284   * the {@code item}.
285   *
286   * @param constraints
287   *          the constraints to execute
288   * @param item
289   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
290   * @param dynamicContext
291   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
292   *          evaluation
293   */
294  private void validateIndex(
295      @NonNull List<? extends IIndexConstraint> constraints,
296      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
297      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
298    for (IIndexConstraint constraint : constraints) {
299      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
300      try {
301        validateIndex(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
302      } catch (MetapathException ex) {
303        rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
304      }
305    }
306  }
307
308  /**
309   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
310   * {@code targets}.
311   *
312   * @param constraint
313   *          the constraint to execute
314   * @param node
315   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
316   *          targets
317   * @param targets
318   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
319   *          Metapath clauses
320   * @param dynamicContext
321   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
322   *          evaluation
323   */
324  private void validateIndex(
325      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
326      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
327      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
328      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
329    String indexName = constraint.getName();
330
331    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
332    if (indexNameToIndexMap.containsKey(indexName)) {
333      handler.handleIndexDuplicateViolation(constraint, node);
334    } else {
335      IIndex index = IIndex.newInstance(constraint.getKeyFields());
336      targets.stream()
337          .forEachOrdered(item -> {
338            assert item != null;
339            if (item.hasValue()) {
340              try {
341                INodeItem oldItem = index.put(item, dynamicContext);
342                if (oldItem == null) {
343                  handlePass(constraint, node, item);
344                } else {
345                  handler.handleIndexDuplicateKeyViolation(constraint, node, oldItem, item);
346                }
347              } catch (MetapathException ex) {
348                handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, node, item, ex);
349              }
350            }
351          });
352      indexNameToIndexMap.put(indexName, index);
353    }
354  }
355
356  private void handlePass(
357      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
358      @NonNull INodeItem node,
359      @NonNull INodeItem item) {
360    if (isFeatureEnabled(ValidationFeature.VALIDATE_GENERATE_PASS_FINDINGS)) {
361      getConstraintValidationHandler().handlePass(constraint, node, item);
362    }
363  }
364
365  /**
366   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
367   * the {@code item}.
368   *
369   * @param constraints
370   *          the constraints to execute
371   * @param item
372   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
373   * @param dynamicContext
374   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
375   *          evaluation
376   */
377  private void validateUnique(
378      @NonNull List<? extends IUniqueConstraint> constraints,
379      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item,
380      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
381    for (IUniqueConstraint constraint : constraints) {
382      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
383      try {
384        validateUnique(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
385      } catch (MetapathException ex) {
386        rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
387      }
388    }
389  }
390
391  /**
392   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
393   * {@code targets}.
394   *
395   * @param constraint
396   *          the constraint to execute
397   * @param node
398   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
399   *          targets
400   * @param targets
401   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
402   *          Metapath clauses
403   * @param dynamicContext
404   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
405   *          evaluation
406   */
407  private void validateUnique(
408      @NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint,
409      @NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem node,
410      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
411      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
412
413    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
414    IIndex index = IIndex.newInstance(constraint.getKeyFields());
415    targets.stream()
416        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
417          assert item != null;
418          if (item.hasValue()) {
419            try {
420              INodeItem oldItem = index.put(item, dynamicContext);
421              if (oldItem == null) {
422                handlePass(constraint, node, item);
423              } else {
424                handler.handleUniqueKeyViolation(constraint, node, oldItem, item);
425              }
426            } catch (MetapathException ex) {
427              handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, node, item, ex);
428              throw ex;
429            }
430          }
431        });
432  }
433
434  /**
435   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
436   * the {@code item}.
437   *
438   * @param constraints
439   *          the constraints to execute
440   * @param item
441   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
442   * @param dynamicContext
443   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
444   *          evaluation
445   */
446  private void validateMatches( // NOPMD false positive
447      @NonNull List<? extends IMatchesConstraint> constraints,
448      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
449      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
450
451    for (IMatchesConstraint constraint : constraints) {
452      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
453      try {
454        validateMatches(constraint, item, targets);
455      } catch (MetapathException ex) {
456        rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
457      }
458    }
459  }
460
461  /**
462   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
463   * {@code targets}.
464   *
465   * @param constraint
466   *          the constraint to execute
467   * @param node
468   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
469   *          targets
470   * @param targets
471   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
472   *          Metapath clauses
473   */
474  private void validateMatches(
475      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
476      @NonNull INodeItem node,
477      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
478    targets.stream()
479        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
480          assert item != null;
481          if (item.hasValue()) {
482            validateMatchesItem(constraint, node, item);
483          }
484        });
485  }
486
487  private void validateMatchesItem(
488      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
489      @NonNull INodeItem node,
490      @NonNull INodeItem item) {
491    String value = FnData.fnDataItem(item).asString();
492
493    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
494    boolean valid = true;
495    Pattern pattern = constraint.getPattern();
496    if (pattern != null && !pattern.asMatchPredicate().test(value)) {
497      // failed pattern match
498      handler.handleMatchPatternViolation(constraint, node, item, value, pattern);
499      valid = false;
500    }
501
502    IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter = constraint.getDataType();
503    if (adapter != null) {
504      try {
505        adapter.parse(value);
506      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
507        handler.handleMatchDatatypeViolation(constraint, node, item, value, adapter, ex);
508        valid = false;
509      }
510    }
511
512    if (valid) {
513      handlePass(constraint, node, item);
514    }
515  }
516
517  /**
518   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
519   * the {@code item}.
520   *
521   * @param constraints
522   *          the constraints to execute
523   * @param item
524   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
525   * @param dynamicContext
526   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
527   *          evaluation
528   */
529  private void validateIndexHasKey( // NOPMD false positive
530      @NonNull List<? extends IIndexHasKeyConstraint> constraints,
531      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
532      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
533
534    for (IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint : constraints) {
535      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
536      validateIndexHasKey(constraint, item, targets);
537    }
538  }
539
540  /**
541   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
542   * {@code targets}.
543   *
544   * @param constraint
545   *          the constraint to execute
546   * @param node
547   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
548   *          targets
549   * @param targets
550   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
551   *          Metapath clauses
552   */
553  private void validateIndexHasKey(
554      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
555      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node,
556      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets) {
557    String indexName = constraint.getIndexName();
558
559    List<KeyRef> keyRefItems = indexNameToKeyRefMap.get(indexName);
560    if (keyRefItems == null) {
561      keyRefItems = new LinkedList<>();
562      indexNameToKeyRefMap.put(indexName, keyRefItems);
563    }
564
565    KeyRef keyRef = new KeyRef(constraint, node, new ArrayList<>(targets.getValue()));
566    keyRefItems.add(keyRef);
567  }
568
569  /**
570   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
571   * the {@code item}.
572   *
573   * @param constraints
574   *          the constraints to execute
575   * @param item
576   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
577   * @param dynamicContext
578   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
579   *          evaluation
580   */
581  private void validateExpect(
582      @NonNull List<? extends IExpectConstraint> constraints,
583      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
584      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
585    for (IExpectConstraint constraint : constraints) {
586      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
587      validateExpect(constraint, item, targets, dynamicContext);
588    }
589  }
590
591  /**
592   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
593   * {@code targets}.
594   *
595   * @param constraint
596   *          the constraint to execute
597   * @param node
598   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
599   *          targets
600   * @param targets
601   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
602   *          Metapath clauses
603   * @param dynamicContext
604   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
605   *          evaluation
606   */
607  private void validateExpect(
608      @NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint,
609      @NonNull INodeItem node,
610      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> targets,
611      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
612    MetapathExpression metapath = MetapathExpression.compile(
613        constraint.getTest(),
614        dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
615
616    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
617    targets.stream()
618        .forEachOrdered(item -> {
619          assert item != null;
620
621          if (item.hasValue()) {
622            try {
623              ISequence<?> result = metapath.evaluate(item, dynamicContext);
624              if (FnBoolean.fnBoolean(result).toBoolean()) {
625                handlePass(constraint, node, item);
626              } else {
627                handler.handleExpectViolation(constraint, node, item, dynamicContext);
628              }
629            } catch (MetapathException ex) {
630              rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
631            }
632          }
633        });
634  }
635
636  /**
637   * Evaluates the provided collection of {@code constraints} in the context of
638   * the {@code item}.
639   *
640   * @param constraints
641   *          the constraints to execute
642   * @param item
643   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation
644   * @param dynamicContext
645   *          the Metapath dynamic execution context to use for Metapath
646   *          evaluation
647   */
648  private void validateAllowedValues(
649      @NonNull List<? extends IAllowedValuesConstraint> constraints,
650      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> item,
651      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
652    for (IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint : constraints) {
653      ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets = constraint.matchTargets(item, dynamicContext);
654      validateAllowedValues(constraint, item, targets);
655    }
656  }
657
658  /**
659   * Evaluates the provided {@code constraint} against each of the
660   * {@code targets}.
661   *
662   * @param constraint
663   *          the constraint to execute
664   * @param node
665   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
666   *          targets
667   * @param targets
668   *          the focus of Metapath evaluation for evaluating any constraint
669   *          Metapath clauses
670   */
671  private void validateAllowedValues(
672      @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint constraint,
673      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node,
674      @NonNull ISequence<? extends IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> targets) {
675    targets.stream().forEachOrdered(item -> {
676      assert item != null;
677      if (item.hasValue()) {
678        try {
679          updateValueStatus(item, constraint, node);
680        } catch (MetapathException ex) {
681          rethrowConstraintError(constraint, item, ex);
682        }
683      }
684    });
685  }
686
687  private static void rethrowConstraintError(
688      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
689      @NonNull INodeItem item,
690      @NonNull MetapathException ex) {
691    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(128);
692    builder.append("A ")
693        .append(constraint.getClass().getName())
694        .append(" constraint");
695
696    String id = constraint.getId();
697    if (id == null) {
698      builder.append(" targeting the metapath '")
699          .append(constraint.getTarget())
700          .append('\'');
701    } else {
702      builder.append(" with id '")
703          .append(id)
704          .append('\'');
705    }
706
707    builder.append(", matching the item at path '")
708        .append(item.getMetapath())
709        .append("', resulted in an unexpected error. The error was: ")
710        .append(ex.getLocalizedMessage());
711
712    throw new MetapathException(builder.toString(), ex);
713  }
714
715  /**
716   * Add a new allowed value to the value status tracker.
717   *
718   * @param targetItem
719   *          the item whose value is targeted by the constraint
720   * @param allowedValues
721   *          the allowed values constraint
722   * @param node
723   *          the original focus of Metapath evaluation for identifying the
724   *          targets
725   */
726  protected void updateValueStatus(
727      @NonNull INodeItem targetItem,
728      @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
729      @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node) {
730    // constraint.getAllowedValues().containsKey(value)
731
732    @Nullable ValueStatus valueStatus = valueMap.get(targetItem);
733    if (valueStatus == null) {
734      valueStatus = new ValueStatus(targetItem);
735      valueMap.put(targetItem, valueStatus);
736    }
737
738    valueStatus.registerAllowedValue(allowedValues, node);
739  }
740
741  /**
742   * Evaluate the value associated with the {@code targetItem} and update the
743   * status tracker.
744   *
745   * @param targetItem
746   *          the item whose value will be validated
747   */
748  protected void handleAllowedValues(@NonNull INodeItem targetItem) {
749    ValueStatus valueStatus = valueMap.remove(targetItem);
750    if (valueStatus != null) {
751      valueStatus.validate();
752    }
753  }
754
755  @Override
756  public void finalizeValidation(DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
757    // key references
758    for (Map.Entry<String, List<KeyRef>> entry : indexNameToKeyRefMap.entrySet()) {
759      String indexName = ObjectUtils.notNull(entry.getKey());
760      IIndex index = indexNameToIndexMap.get(indexName);
761
762      List<KeyRef> keyRefs = entry.getValue();
763
764      for (KeyRef keyRef : keyRefs) {
765        IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint = keyRef.getConstraint();
766
767        INodeItem node = keyRef.getNode();
768        List<INodeItem> targets = keyRef.getTargets();
769        for (INodeItem item : targets) {
770          assert item != null;
771
772          validateKeyRef(constraint, node, item, indexName, index, dynamicContext);
773        }
774      }
775    }
776  }
777
778  private void validateKeyRef(
779      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
780      @NonNull INodeItem contextNode,
781      @NonNull INodeItem item,
782      @NonNull String indexName,
783      @Nullable IIndex index,
784      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
785    IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
786    try {
787      List<String> key = IIndex.toKey(item, constraint.getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
788
789      if (index == null) {
790        handler.handleMissingIndexViolation(constraint, contextNode, item, ObjectUtils.notNull(
791            String.format("Key reference to undefined index with name '%s'", indexName)));
792      } else {
793        INodeItem referencedItem = index.get(key);
794
795        if (referencedItem == null) {
796          handler.handleIndexMiss(constraint, contextNode, item, key);
797        } else {
798          handlePass(constraint, contextNode, item);
799        }
800      }
801    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
802      handler.handleKeyMatchError(constraint, contextNode, item, ex);
803    }
804  }
805
806  private class ValueStatus {
807    @NonNull
808    private final List<Pair<IAllowedValuesConstraint, IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>>> constraints = new LinkedList<>();
809    @NonNull
810    private final String value;
811    @NonNull
812    private final INodeItem item;
813    private boolean allowOthers = true;
814    @NonNull
815    private IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible extensible = IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.EXTERNAL;
816
817    public ValueStatus(@NonNull INodeItem item) {
818      this.item = item;
819      this.value = FnData.fnDataItem(item).asString();
820    }
821
822    public void registerAllowedValue(
823        @NonNull IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues,
824        @NonNull IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node) {
825      this.constraints.add(Pair.of(allowedValues, node));
826      if (!allowedValues.isAllowedOther()) {
827        // record the most restrictive value
828        allowOthers = false;
829      }
830
831      IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible newExtensible = allowedValues.getExtensible();
832      if (newExtensible.ordinal() > extensible.ordinal()) {
833        // record the most restrictive value
834        extensible = allowedValues.getExtensible();
835      } else if (IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(newExtensible)
836          && IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(extensible)) {
837        // this is an error, where there are two none constraints that conflict
838        throw new MetapathException(
839            String.format("Multiple constraints have extensibility scope=none at path '%s'", item.getMetapath()));
840      } else if (allowedValues.getExtensible().ordinal() < extensible.ordinal()) {
841        String msg = String.format(
842            "An allowed values constraint with an extensibility scope '%s'"
843                + " exceeds the allowed scope '%s' at path '%s'",
844            allowedValues.getExtensible().name(), extensible.name(), item.getMetapath());
845        LOGGER.atError().log(msg);
846        throw new MetapathException(msg);
847      }
848    }
849
850    public void validate() {
851      if (!constraints.isEmpty()) {
852        boolean match = false;
853        List<IAllowedValuesConstraint> failedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
854        IConstraintValidationHandler handler = getConstraintValidationHandler();
855        for (Pair<IAllowedValuesConstraint, IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> pair : constraints) {
856          IAllowedValuesConstraint allowedValues = pair.getLeft();
857          IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?> node = ObjectUtils.notNull(pair.getRight());
858          IAllowedValue matchingValue = allowedValues.getAllowedValue(value);
859          if (matchingValue != null) {
860            match = true;
861            handlePass(allowedValues, node, item);
862          } else if (IAllowedValuesConstraint.Extensible.NONE.equals(allowedValues.getExtensible())) {
863            // hard failure, since no other values can satisfy this constraint
864            failedConstraints = CollectionUtil.singletonList(allowedValues);
865            match = false;
866            break;
867          } else {
868            failedConstraints.add(allowedValues);
869          } // this constraint passes, but we need to make sure other constraints do as well
870        }
871
872        // it's not a failure if allow others is true
873        if (!match && !allowOthers) {
874          handler.handleAllowedValuesViolation(failedConstraints, item);
875        }
876      }
877    }
878  }
879
880  class Visitor
881      extends AbstractNodeItemVisitor<DynamicContext, Void> {
882
883    @NonNull
884    private DynamicContext handleLetStatements(
885        @NonNull INodeItem focus,
886        @NonNull Map<QName, ILet> letExpressions,
887        @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
888
889      DynamicContext retval;
890      Collection<ILet> lets = letExpressions.values();
891      if (lets.isEmpty()) {
892        retval = dynamicContext;
893      } else {
894        final DynamicContext subContext = dynamicContext.subContext();
895
896        for (ILet let : lets) {
897          QName name = let.getName();
898          ISequence<?> result = let.getValueExpression().evaluate(focus, subContext);
899
900          // ensure the sequence is list backed
901          result.getValue();
902
903          subContext.bindVariableValue(name, result);
904        }
905        retval = subContext;
906      }
907      return retval;
908    }
909
910    @Override
911    public Void visitFlag(@NonNull IFlagNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
912      assert context != null;
913
914      IFlagDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
915      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
916
917      validateFlag(item, effectiveContext);
918      super.visitFlag(item, effectiveContext);
919      handleAllowedValues(item);
920      return null;
921    }
922
923    @Override
924    public Void visitField(@NonNull IFieldNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
925      assert context != null;
926
927      IFieldDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
928      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
929
930      validateField(item, effectiveContext);
931      super.visitField(item, effectiveContext);
932      handleAllowedValues(item);
933      return null;
934    }
935
936    @Override
937    public Void visitAssembly(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
938      assert context != null;
939
940      IAssemblyDefinition definition = item.getDefinition();
941      DynamicContext effectiveContext = handleLetStatements(item, definition.getLetExpressions(), context);
942
943      validateAssembly(item, effectiveContext);
944      super.visitAssembly(item, effectiveContext);
945      return null;
946    }
947
948    @Override
949    public Void visitMetaschema(@NonNull IModuleNodeItem item, DynamicContext context) {
950      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("not needed");
951    }
952
953    @Override
954    protected Void defaultResult() {
955      // no result value
956      return null;
957    }
958  }
959
960  private static class KeyRef {
961    @NonNull
962    private final IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint;
963    @NonNull
964    private final INodeItem node;
965    @NonNull
966    private final List<INodeItem> targets;
967
968    public KeyRef(
969        @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
970        @NonNull INodeItem node,
971        @NonNull List<INodeItem> targets) {
972      this.node = node;
973      this.constraint = constraint;
974      this.targets = targets;
975    }
976
977    @NonNull
978    public IIndexHasKeyConstraint getConstraint() {
979      return constraint;
980    }
981
982    @NonNull
983    protected INodeItem getNode() {
984      return node;
985    }
986
987    @NonNull
988    public List<INodeItem> getTargets() {
989      return targets;
990    }
991  }
992}
